user_instruction: 'Assist me in responding to Mark'"'"'s recent inquiry about bank procedures (mark@trustwellbank.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Help Needed: Locate Materials for Mark’s Procedure Inquiry

Hi [Recipient Name],

Could you please check my Gmail and Notion workspaces for any materials related to our current teller procedures? Mark (mark@trustwellbank.com) has asked for guidance, and I want to make sure I share the most up-to-date information with him.

I’m specifically looking for:
• The latest Teller Operations Manual  
• Recent memos or emails about transaction limits, cash-drawer balancing, and customer-ID requirements  
• Any new-teller training guides or FAQs

Once you locate these items, could you either forward the relevant emails or grant me Notion links so I can compile a thorough response for Mark?

A quick turnaround would be much appreciated—ideally by end of day.

Thank you so much for your help!

Best,  
Jane

final_output:
